tips.name: Tip 1, letter 1
tips.text: Emojis hint at a fairy tale; identify the item from its title.

tips.name: Tip 1, letter 2
tips.text: Shade all areas with the number eight.

tips.name: Tip 1, letter 3
tips.text: It's the shape of the images that matters, not their meanings.

tips.name: Tip 2, letter 1 answer
tips.text: Little Red Riding Hood.

tips.name: Tip 2, letter 2 answer
tips.text: Dog.

tips.name: Tip 2, letter 3 answer
tips.text: The images form the word - coconut.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: "Move" each gift along the sorting belt, choosing the correct path at the junctions.

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text: The gift route forms letters.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is VIP. Take films with letters VIP and attach to the envelope #2.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: You need information on Partington's letters from Glasgow spanning 1956 to 1958.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: In each section, pinpoint the boxes likely to hold the relevant data.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Line up the cabinets to reveal a seamless pattern of the marked boxes.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is KEY.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Scan the markings and get three characteristics for each letter: colour, size, weight.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Attach the scanner to the outline marking. You need visible symbols.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text:
Colour: Red, yellow, blue. Use the colour mixing rule. Number 1 means that the colour is used, 0 - not.
Size: Use the "Envelope Sizes" table to determine the size of the letters.
Weight: 1 - Christmas tree, 2 - snowman, 3 - sock, 4 - mitten, 5 - ball, 6 - bell, 7 - star, 8 - cane, 9 - candle.

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text:
Letter 1: orange, C5, 8g.
Letter 2: green, C6, 3g.
Letter 3: blue, E65, 5g.

tips.name: Tip 5
tips.text: Check where each letter ends up when sent through the pneumatic mail system.

tips.name: Tip 6
tips.text: All the letters were directed to the ninth reindeer.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is Rudolph.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Assemble all three toys using the parts. Determine what the third toy is.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is ROCKET.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: The letters along the route form the phrase: “Santa's favourite entrance”.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is CHIMNEY.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Place the stickers in the right places to answer the crossword puzzle questions. Don't forget about the house on the box lid.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text:
Flags: under the shelf with a steam locomotive.
Christmas stocking: by the fireplace in the house that is on the lid of the box.
Stack of Books: on the bookshelf.
Cup: on the chest of drawers next to the blue chair.
Star: on the tree in the house that is on the lid of the box.
Bucket: on the snowman’s head that is on the box lid.
Horse: in the room with a horseshoe and a stack of hay.
Rocket: in the room with the moon and stars outside the window.
Sleds: in the house with the ski and skate.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text:
Write your answers in the circles, starting at the arrow.
1. Window
2. Candle
3. Cat
4. Orange
5. Cactus
6. Adventure
7. Vase
8. Biscuit
9. Icicle

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text: Make a word by unscrambling the letters in the highlighted circles.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is WINTER.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Assemble the plywood tree.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: On Grandpa's gifts: heart = horse, star = rocket, snowflake = sled.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Set the tree on the spiral from the previous task. Count the specified number of symbols and note the letter in the circle beneath the symbol.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is Claus.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: You need a tree on the lid of the box.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Pierce the bulbs. The holes form a symbol.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is CANDLE.
